title: Does a Viral Video Show ‘Paralysis’ Pills in Turkish Snack Sold in the US?
subtitle: The image of two small tablets inside a Luppo coconut cream bar caused widespread concern — and widespread misinformation — in November 2019.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: A viral video shows a cake bar that is sold in the U.S. with two "paralysis tablets" added to it by its Turkish manufacturers.
